stories.original_headline: Scientists found a sugar that could defeat deadly superbugs
stories.original_summary: Scientists in Australia have uncovered a clever new way to fight some of the most dangerous drug-resistant bacteria by targeting a sugar that exists only on bacterial cells. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Sweet Spell to Vanquish Dreadful Blight!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise Alchemists from the Sunken Isles have discovered a cunning way to fight the most dangerous plagues. They found a unique, enchanted sugar found only on the dark blight creatures. By crafting special spirit guides that recognize this sugar, they can awaken the body's defenses to banish the sickness.

stories.original_summary: I've used Alexa to manage my shopping list for years. stories.fantasy_headline: Troubled Merchant Renounces Grumpy Spirit for Friendlier Helper!
stories.fantasy_story: A village merchant, reliant on the Echo-Whisperer's enchanted parchment for market provisions, grew weary of its grumbling spirit. The old scrying mirror in his kitchen and his pocket orb once worked well for voice commands. Now, he plans to consult a more cheerful sprite to manage his important ledger.

stories.fantasy_headline: Artisan Guild Unveils New Gemstone Casings for Chrono-Play Artifacts!
stories.fantasy_story: The skilled Artisan's Guild has revealed a new collection of rare, enchanted casings for their renowned Chrono-Play Artifacts. After last season's clear crystal versions, these new designs draw inspiration from vibrant gemstones and ancient lore. Only a select few will be able to acquire these dazzling, limited-edition relics.
